snippet.title: VOLUME - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: The first trailer for Mike Bithell's new game, Volume. Mike is joined again by composer David Housden, and a massive new team of artists. Platforms will be announced shortly, and the game's story and cast will be revealed at Gamecity 8 in Nottingham.
